githubPullRequests.pullRequestTitle.deprecationMessage: The pull request title now uses the same defaults as GitHub, and can be edited before create.
enumDescriptions: Ask which of the above methods to use
githubPullRequests.pullRequestTitle.description: The title used when creating pull requests.

githubPullRequests.includeRemotes.deprecationMessage: The setting `githubPullRequests.includeRemotes` has been deprecated. Use `githubPullRequests.remotes` to configure what remotes are shown.
githubPullRequests.includeRemotes.description: By default we only support remotes created by users. If you want to see pull requests from remotes this extension created for pull requests, change this setting to 'all'.

githubPullRequests.showInSCM.deprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Views can now be dragged to any location.
githubPullRequests.showInSCM.description: When true, show GitHub Pull Requests within the SCM viewlet. Otherwise show a separate view container for them.

editor/title.when: resourceScheme != pr && resourceScheme != review && resourceScheme != filechange && resourcePath in github:unviewedFiles
resourceScheme != pr && resourceScheme != review && resourceScheme != filechange && resourcePath in github:viewedFiles

colors.description: The color used for the assignees and labels fields in a new issue editor.
The color used for indicating that an issue is open.
The color used for indicating that an issue is closed.
The color used for indicating a notification on a pull request

scripts.test:preprocess: yarn run compile:test && yarn run test:preprocess-gql && yarn run test:preprocess-svg
scripts.update-dts: cd "src/@types" && npx vscode-dts main && npx vscode-dts dev
